amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt rules pertaining to the safety of children's products or toys.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ruiz amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 233 (Roll no. 40).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ruiz amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 233 (Roll no. 40).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Ruiz.
